definition: to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
evil elements who have escaped eradication

sentences.english: At the same time, it is described how to treat the denitrified residua.
sentences.chinese: 同时还简要介绍了脱氮残渣的处理方法。

sentences.english: Take up the residue in 2 quantities, each of 5 ml, of dilute hydrochloric acid R.
sentences.chinese: 将供试品炽灼残渣分成两份，每份加入5ml稀盐酸。

sentences.english: Eliminates hard water mineral and scale residue.
sentences.chinese: 清除硬水中的矿物质和残渣。

sentences.english: Just think of all those bits of food that would be left behind if we didn’t floss.
sentences.chinese: 如果不使用牙线的话，那些食物残渣就会留在牙缝里。

sentences.english: No fluid residue formed to affect machine operation.
sentences.chinese: 不会产生防碍机器运作的残渣。

sentences.english: Another goal is to make the bugs quicker at breaking down the brewery waste.
sentences.chinese: 另一个目的就是能够让这些菌类更快地分解酿酒残渣。

sentences.english: The pigment stability from crayfish offal was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究了龙虾壳酶解残渣中虾青素的稳定性。

sentences.english: The oil will slowly drip into the container, and any crumbs and particles will remain in the filter.
sentences.chinese: 油灰慢慢滴入容器中，食物残渣将被留在滤网中。

sentences.english: No need to clean the filter of all the mouldy food that gets caught in it- it all gets minced.
sentences.chinese: 掉在过滤器里的残渣也不用清理掉，它会被切碎。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a kind of recycling method of terephthalic acid (TPA) water-washing residue.
sentences.chinese: 本发明为一种对苯二甲酸水洗残渣回收利用的方法。

sentences.english: The carbonaceous residue formed after evaporation and pyrolysis of a petroleum product.
sentences.chinese: 石油产品蒸发和裂解后生成的碳质残渣。

sentences.english: Mary scraped the residue of food from the plates before putting them under water.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽在把盘子放入水之前先刮去上面的食物残渣。

sentences.english: BSG is the residue left after saccharification, filteration and separation of the wort during the brewing process.
sentences.chinese: 啤酒糟是啤酒酿造过程中糖化后分离麦汁剩下的残渣。

sentences.english: Gehlenite is the major constituent in the gasification residue of raw char.
sentences.chinese: 原煤焦气化残渣中主要含钙铝黄长石。

sentences.english: After filtration the remainder is roasted to remove carbon and dissolved in aqua regia again.
sentences.chinese: 过滤后的渣子灼烧除炭，后用王水溶解残渣。

sentences.english: The function of desire is a last residuum of the effect of the signifier in the subject.
sentences.chinese: 欲望的功用是意符影响主体的最后残渣。
